choices.C: Storage DRS is configured only for cross-datacenter migrations.
choices.B: Storage DRS is not enabled for this cluster.
choices.A: DRS is not enabled for this cluster.
choices.D: DRS is not set to fully automated.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct because the question is mentioned about only storage move. That means Compute move is working fine and DRS is set to Fully Automated. Storage DRS is not enabled.

Selected Answer: D
For me its D - https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Aria-Operations/8.12/Configuring-Operations/GUID-F7DF8D29-89F3-455B-883B-6DECA11B0114.html

questions.question_text:
An administrator is unable to move a storage resource when using Workload Management.
What is the underlying reason for this problem?

choices.D: Scheduling of reports can be done hourly, daily, weekly, and monthly.
choices.E: Reports scheduled for generation can only be shared out via email.
choices.B: Only PDF type reports can be used to schedule a report generation.
choices.C: A report layout can contain table of contents, cover page, and footer.
choices.A: Views and Dashboards are the only data types available for a report.

questions.question_text: Which two statements accurately characterize reports in vRealize Operations? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Also voting for A,C as it cannot be scheduled hourly
AC is correct as you cannot schedule reports to be hourly

questions.question_text:
A customer is using multiple vRealize Operations (vROps) instances and has one central development vROps instance for creating dashboards. The administrator is tasked to share the newly created dashboards with other vROps instances, and the dashboards must be editable in the other instances.
Which action should the administrator take to accomplish this goal?

choices.B: Use the Embed option to import the HTML code into the other instances.
choices.D: Export the dashboard from the development instance, and import the dashboard into the other instance.
choices.C: Connect the vROps instances together, and synchronize the dashboards.
choices.A: Generate a custom URL, set the expiration to "never expire", and import this URL into the other instance.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct answer as you can export/import

Selected Answer: ACD
correct answer 
Proactive identification and remediation of emerging performance, capacity, and configuration issues

Automated capacity optimization and planning
Enforcement of standards for continuous compliance
Open and extensible platform that leverages existing investments, with third-party management packs for Microsoft, SAP, and more

questions.question_text: Which three key benefits does vRealize Operations provide within an environment? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: Yes, BD is the correct Options

Selected Answer: BD
here is the docs

Selected Answer: BD
If communications between the fault domains is completely interrupted for several minutes, then one of the fault domains will automatically go offline. After the network interruption is restored, admin user needs to manually bring the fault domain online which will begin the data synchronization.

questions.question_text:
An administrator has deployed a vRealize Operations (vROps) cluster in a Continuous Availability configuration across the two racks in two fault domains. Following a network outage that occurred for several minutes, the administrator has been tasked to ensure that the vROps deployment is still healthy. They have noted that one cluster can still contact the witness node.
Which two events will occur as a result of the outage? (Choose two.)

choices.E: Both fault domains will be offline.
choices.D: One fault domain will go offline.
choices.C: The administrator will need to restart and resync the vROps cluster.
choices.B: The administrator will need to bring the other fault domain online manually.
choices.A: The vROps cluster will bring the fault domain back automatically once the network has been restored.
